feed.title: Minio Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Minio: Bugfix Release
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • do not list dangling objects with unmatched ECs by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20351
  • fix: keep locks on same pool for simplicity by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20356
  • add consistent nonce to make multipart deterministic per part by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20359
  • batch: repl: A missing prefix in the remote source will fail replication by @vadmeste in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20365
  • Store the checksum in PostPolicyHandler so that we can return it on Gâ€¦ by @marktheunissen in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20364
  • ignore if-unmodified-since header if if-match is set by @T-TRz879 in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20326
  • remove mincache EOS related feature from upstream by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20375
  • site-repl: Fix ILM document replication in some cases by @vadmeste in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20380
  • Dont start console service if MINIO_BROWSER=off by @shtripat in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20374
  • batch:repl fix copy from source -> remote by @poornas in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20382
  • xl-meta - verify parity data by @klauspost in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20384
  • verify part.N exists before reading part.N.meta by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20383
  • fix: jwt error overrwriten by nil public key by @jiuker in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20387
  • make sure listParts returns parts that are valid by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20390
  • readParts: Return error when quorum unavailable by @krisis in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20389
  • fix: avoid waiting on rebalance metadata by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20392
  • all 2xx status codes to be success for audit by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20394
  • Kafka notify: support batched commits for queue store by @Praveenrajmani in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20377
  • Fix duplicate groups in ListGroups API by @taran-p in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20396
  • Limit Response Recorder memory by @klauspost in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20399
  • Auditfix by @zveinn in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20401
  • Add support for audit/logger max retry and retry interval by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20402
  • fix: set audit/logger webhook retry interval to maximum 1m by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20404
  • Don't send a canceled context to Unlock by @klauspost in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20409
  • Add multipart uploads cache for ListMultipartUploads() by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20407
  • Skip non existent ldap entities while import by @shtripat in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20352

New Contributors

  • @T-TRz879 made their first contribution in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20326

Full Changelog: https://github.com/minio/minio/compare/RELEASE.2024-08-29T01-40-52Z...RELEASE.2024-09-09T16-59-28Z

entry.title: New release for Minio: Bugfix release
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Reenable SVE support for Graviton 4 by @fwessels in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20410
  • use rename() safety for in-place 'xl.meta' updates by @poornas in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20414
  • fix: Add missing grid handler of clearing upload-id from the cache by @vadmeste in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20420
  • handle the actualSize() properly for PostUpload() by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20422
  • Add http_timeout to audit webhook configurations by @zveinn in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20421
  • making sure we don't panic if globalReplicationStats have not been set by @zveinn in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20427
  • multipart support etag and pre-read small objects by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20423
  • Download static cURL into release Docker image for all supported architectures by @fumoboy007 in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20424
  • IAM import test with missing entities by @shtripat in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20368
  • Enable compression with encryption in CopyObject API by @vadmeste in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20411
  • tier: Add force param to force tiering removal by @vadmeste in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20355
  • hold granular locking for multi-pool PutObject() by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20434

New Contributors

  • @fumoboy007 made their first contribution in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20424

Full Changelog: https://github.com/minio/minio/compare/RELEASE.2024-09-09T16-59-28Z...RELEASE.2024-09-13T20-26-02Z

entry.title: New release for Minio: Bugfix Release
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Limit S3 Select JSON documents to 10MB by @klauspost in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20439
  • remove windows CI/CD for now by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20441
  • Fix behavior of AddServiceAccountLDAP for non-admin users by @taran-p in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20442
  • Added iam import tests for openid by @shtripat in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20432
  • batch: Set a default retry attempts and a prefix by @vadmeste in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20452
  • Ensure proper stale_uploads_cleanup_interval is used at all times by @ramondeklein in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20451
  • Log an error when calculating the binary checksum failed by @ramondeklein in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20454
  • Fix PutObject Trailing checksum by @klauspost in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20456
  • fix: add default http timeout for audit webhook by @jiuker in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20460
  • Use MinIO console v1.7.1 by @ramondeklein in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20465
  • Add ListAccessKeysBulk API for builtin user access keys by @taran-p in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20381
  • upgrade deps pkg/v3, madmin-go/v3 and lz4/v4 by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20467

Full Changelog: https://github.com/minio/minio/compare/RELEASE.2024-09-13T20-26-02Z...RELEASE.2024-09-22T00-33-43Z

entry.title: New release for Minio: Bugfix Release
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Limit jstream parse depth by @klauspost in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20474
  • remove the list from 'mc stat' from testing via '--no-list' by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20468
  • cleanup existing part.N's before renamePart() by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20466
  • hold on to batch job stats till cleanup by @poornas in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20480
  • use absolute path for binary checksum verification by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20487
  • Fix PPC cgroup memory limit by @klauspost in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20488
  • fix: allow all console actions with custom authZ by @donatello in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20489
  • Change delete marker proxy test to use distributed setup by @poornas in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20494
  • handle the locks properly for multi-pool callers by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20495
  • heal: Use etag as quorum when none found for modtime by @vadmeste in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20500
  • Fix checksum error during startup when minio is loaded via PATH environment variable by @ramondeklein in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20509
  • upgrade relevant dependencies by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20507
  • list all batch job types by @poornas in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20510
  • avoid audit logs with unexpected errors by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20516

Full Changelog: https://github.com/minio/minio/compare/RELEASE.2024-09-22T00-33-43Z...RELEASE.2024-10-02T17-50-41Z

entry.title: New release for Minio: Bugfix Release
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add root user to ListAccessKeysBulk by @taran-p in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20517
  • fix: when readQuorum, inconsistent metadata return 404 by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20522
  • do not download binary before verifying the version by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20523
  • remove replication stats from data usage cache by @poornas in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20524
  • fix tagging overwrite during resync by @poornas in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20525
  • set kms keyid in replication opts by @poornas in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20542
  • Helm: Add extraVolumes and extraVolumeMounts to the customCommandJob section by @harrybrwn in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19988
  • feat(helm) making securityContext consistent by @ymazzer in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20546
  • Allow LDAP DNs with slashes to be loaded from object store by @taran-p in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20541
  • fix(helm) removing clusterDomain from startup command to avoid local â€¦ by @ymazzer in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20547
  • avoid unnecessary logging for KMS secret key mismatch by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20549

New Contributors

  • @harrybrwn made their first contribution in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19988
  • @ymazzer made their first contribution in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20546

Full Changelog: https://github.com/minio/minio/compare/RELEASE.2024-10-02T17-50-41Z...RELEASE.2024-10-13T13-34-11Z
